name: Deviation Edge Length Constraint
description: Make the length of a deviation edge reach a target value.

inputParameters.name: edge_key
inputParameters.description: The key of a COMPAS CEM deviation edge.

inputParameters.name: weight
inputParameters.description: The weight of the constraint in the optimization problem. Defaults to one.

outputParameters.name: constraint
outputParameters.description: A COMPAS CEM deviation edge length constraint.
